      Subclasses of PolicySetChild in com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.policy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Policy
      Policy extends PolicyDef to represent a XACML 3.0 Policy element.
      class  PolicyDef
      PolicyDef extends PolicySetChild with members and methods common to XACML 3.0 Policies and PolicySets.
      class  PolicyIdReference
      PolicyIdReference extends PolicyIdReferenceBase for Policy objects with an implementation of the ensureReferencee method to find a Policy.
      class  PolicyIdReferenceBase<T extends PolicyDef>
      PolicyIdReferenceBase extends PolicySetChild to implement a XACML PolicyIdReference element.
      class  PolicySet
      PolicySet extends PolicyDef to represent a XACML PolicySet element.
      class  PolicySetIdReference
      PolicySetIdReference extends PolicyIdReferenceBase for com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.PolicySet objects to implement the ensureReferencee method to find PolicySets.
